entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING , Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 10:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
